strings.Value: [Hide and eavesdrop on the conversation]
[Attack] "Just what I was looking for!"
[Continue eavesdropping]
[Continue eavesdropping]
[Push the bandit off the cliff]

{n}Heavily armed men are seated around the fire. They chat casually and pass around a flask, obviously not expecting ambush or eavesdropping in a place like this.{/n} "Damned {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen} and {mf|his|her} damned guards! Since that ass downed the Stag Lord, honest people got nowhere to go to get themselves some coin! Just look where we ended up — middle of nowhere!"
"Damn right... More traders on the roads, and what good of it? Try and pluck them even a bit, and you're locked up in no time!"
"Enough, cut the whining! We gotta adapt if we wanna survive! This birdy'll bring us more gold than any trader, and then we can sell ourselves as mercenaries, or go treasure hunting... We'll get by!"

"With you in charge, we'll end up with our necks broken! Care to explain what demon possessed you to make us climb up a cliff when there's a neat, safe path on the other side? Why we gotta bother with all these hooks and ropes?"
"I'm not afraid of nothing! It's just... these damned spiders! Rather fight a troll than mess with those ugly beasts!"
"Oh, ha ha. I'm just exploding with laughter. Maybe you should become a bard, huh? Better yet, head straight to the capital, ask the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen} to hire you as court jester!"
"Someone's here! Arm yourselves, lads!"
"The {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}? Is {mf||s}he everywhere?!"
"Have you SEEN that path? Spiders everywhere! Just... swarming with spiders, crawling all around! Damned fat, furry beasts... I hate spiders."
"Ha ha ha! Really? You're afraid of spiders?"
"Oh, watch out! There's a spider in your hair!"
"Did some of the Stag Lord's folks really join the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}'s guards? Sounds like life on easy street."
"Yeah, and maybe that's good for them, but I'm not cut out for bootlicking. A sharp sword and a highway — that's the life for me. I'm not gonna end up someone's lapdog!"
"Abyss take you all, you damn jokers! I'm gonna take a leak." {n}The bandit stands and heads toward you on unsteady feet. Pushing him off the cliff would be easy right now.{/n}
"Just don't go through the front door — there might be spiders inside! Better take a rope and scale the back wall!"
{n}With a horrible scream, the bandit falls. His accomplices jump up and grab their weapons.{/n}
{n}Ekun silently nods to you and readies his weapon.{/n}
"Boo!" {n}Regongar jumps in front of the bandit and tackles him.{/n}
{n}Octavia giggles.{/n}
"Octavia, quiet! We're trying to ambush them!"
"Oh! Sorry."
"Bandits..." {n}Valerie whispers, putting her hand on her scabbard.{/n}
